statements: SELECT * FROM employee_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_id, expiration_date FROM employee_documents WHERE document_type = 'passport';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_type LIKE '%permanent%';
SELECT * FROM employee_documents WHERE document_type = 'ID' AND upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_type, expiration_date FROM employee_documents WHERE document_type LIKE '%passport%' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE end_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM employee_documents;
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT document_type, document_name FROM employee_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM employee_documents WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM employee_documents GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM employee_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM employee_contracts WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, document_name FROM employee_documents WHERE document_type = 'Resume';
SELECT * FROM employee_contracts ORDER BY start_date ASC, salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_date FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM employee_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Permanent';
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM employee_contracts ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM employee_contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Permanent' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, compliance_status FROM employee_documents d INNER JOIN employee_compliance c ON d.document_id = c.document_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Complete';

SELECT e.document_name, c.compliance_status, c.compliance_date FROM employee_documents e JOIN employee_compliance c ON e.document_id = c.document_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Incomplete' ORDER BY c.compliance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_documents;
SELECT document_name, employee_id FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT document_path, upload_date FROM employee_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM document_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Legal%';
SELECT contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM employee_contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name, employee_id FROM employee_documents WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT contract_type, start_date, end_date, employee_id FROM employee_contracts WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT contract_id, version_id, version_number, version_date FROM contract_versions ORDER BY version_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM document_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Legal%' ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doc_id, document_name, upload_date FROM employee_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY first_name DESC;

SELECT employees.first_name, employees.last_name, contracts.document_name FROM employees JOIN contracts ON employees.id = contracts.employee_id WHERE contracts.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT employees.first_name, employees.last_name, document_types.type_name FROM employees JOIN employee_documents ON employees.id = employee_documents.employee_id JOIN document_types ON employee_documents.document_type_id = document_types.type_id WHERE employee_documents.upload_date >= '2022-07-01';

SELECT compliance_documents.document_name, compliance_documents.upload_date, employees.first_name, employees.email FROM compliance_documents JOIN employees ON compliance_documents.upload_date >= '2022-01-01' AND employees.department = 'HR' ORDER BY compliance_documents.upload_date DESC;
